<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
  <title>About Us | Teenagers Department</title>
  <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Poppins:wght@400;500;600;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
  <style>
    /* ========== GLOBAL STYLES ========== */
    * { margin:0; padding:0; box-sizing:border-box; }
    body {
      font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
      color: #fff;
      min-height: 100vh;
      animation: bgGradient 10s ease infinite;
      background: linear-gradient(135deg, #00bf72, #009e4f, #004d40);
      background-size: 300% 300%;
    }
    @keyframes bgGradient {
      0% { background-position: 0% 50%; }
      50% { background-position: 100% 50%; }
      100% { background-position: 0% 50%; }
    }
    .container { max-width: 1100px; margin: auto; padding: 3rem 2rem; }

    h2 {
      text-align: center;
      font-size: 2rem;
      margin-bottom: 2rem;
      color: #ffeb3b;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      letter-spacing: 1px;
    }
    p { line-height: 1.6; font-size: 1rem; }

    /* ========== NAVIGATION ========== */
nav {
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 80px;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, #006400, #00b140); /* gradient green */
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  padding: 0 20px;
  z-index: 1000;
  transition: top 0.4s ease; /* smooth hide/show */
}

    .nav-logo { font-size: 1.6rem; font-weight: 700; color: #ffeb3b; }
    .nav-menu { list-style: none; display: flex; gap: 1.5rem; }
    .nav-menu a {
      color: #fff; text-decoration: none; font-weight: 500;
      transition: 0.3s; padding: 0.4rem 0.8rem; border-radius: 6px;
    }
    .nav-menu a:hover, .nav-menu a.active {
      background: #00bf72;
    }

    /* ========== HERO ========== */
    .hero {
      height: 60vh;
      background: url('https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1529070538774-1843cb3265df?auto=format&fit=crop&w=1600&q=80') center/cover no-repeat;
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
      text-align: center;
      position: relative;
    }
    .hero::after {
      content:"";
      position: absolute;
      top:0; left:0; right:0; bottom:0;
      background: rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
    }
    .hero h1 {
      position: relative;
      font-size: 3rem;
      z-index: 1;
      color: #fff;
      text-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(0,0,0,0.8);
    }

    /* ========== MISSION & VISION ========== */
    .mv-grid {
      display: grid;
      grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(250px, 1fr));
      gap: 2rem;
      margin-top: 1rem;
    }
    .mv-card {
      background: rgba(255,255,255,0.1);
      padding: 2rem;
      border-radius: 12px;
      text-align: center;
      transition: transform .3s;
      backdrop-filter: blur(6px);
    }
    .mv-card:hover { transform: translateY(-6px); }
    .mv-card h3 {
      color: #ffeb3b;
      margin-bottom: 1rem;
      font-size: 1.4rem;
    }

    /* ========== UNITS ========== */
    .unit-grid {
      display: grid;
      grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(200px, 1fr));
      gap: 1.5rem;
    }
    .unit-card {
      background: rgba(255,255,255,0.12);
      padding: 1.5rem;
      border-radius: 12px;
      text-align: center;
      font-weight: 600;
      font-size: 1.1rem;
      transition: .3s;
      backdrop-filter: blur(6px);
    }
    .unit-card:hover { transform: translateY(-6px); background: rgba(0,0,0,0.4); }

    /* ========== LEADERS CAROUSEL ========== */
    .carousel {
      overflow: hidden;
      position: relative;
      margin-top: 2rem;
    }
    .carousel-track {
      display: flex;
      transition: transform 0.6s ease;
    }
    .leader-card {
      min-width: 250px;
      margin: 0 1rem;
      background: rgba(255,255,255,0.1);
      border-radius: 12px;
      padding: 1.5rem;
      text-align: center;
      backdrop-filter: blur(6px);
      transition: 0.3s;
    }
    .leader-card:hover { transform: translateY(-8px); }
    .leader-card img {
      width: 90px; height: 90px; border-radius: 50%; margin-bottom: 1rem;
      border: 3px solid #ffeb3b; object-fit: cover;
    }
    .carousel-btn {
      position: absolute; top: 50%; transform: translateY(-50%);
      background: rgba(0,0,0,0.6); border: none; color: #fff;
      font-size: 2rem; padding: 0.3rem 0.7rem; cursor: pointer;
      border-radius: 50%; z-index: 10;
    }
    .carousel-btn:hover { background: rgba(0,0,0,0.8); }
    .prev { left: 10px; }
    .next { right: 10px; }

    /* ========== GALLERY ========== */
    .gallery {
      display: grid;
      grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(250px, 1fr));
      gap: 1rem;
      margin-top: 2rem;
    }
    .gallery img {
      width: 100%; border-radius: 10px;
      transition: transform 0.4s, filter 0.4s;
    }
    .gallery img:hover {
      transform: scale(1.07);
      filter: brightness(110%);
    }

    /* ========== CTA ========== */
    .cta {
      text-align: center;
      padding: 3rem 2rem;
      background: rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
      margin-top: 3rem;
      border-radius: 12px;
    }
    .cta h2 { color: #ffeb3b; margin-bottom: 1rem; }
    .cta p { margin-bottom: 1.5rem; font-size: 1.1rem; }
    .btn-green {
      background: #00bf72; color: #fff;
      padding: 0.7rem 1.5rem;
      border: none; border-radius: 30px;
      font-weight: 600; cursor: pointer;
      transition: .3s;
    }
    .btn-green:hover { background: #ffeb3b; color: #000; }

    /* ========== FOOTER ========== */
    footer {
      margin-top: 2rem;
      text-align: center;
      padding: 1.5rem;
      background: rgba(0,0,0,0.6);
      font-size: 0.9rem;
    }
    @media (max-width: 768px) {
  nav ul {
    display: none;
    flex-direction: column;
    background: #000;
    position: absolute;
    top: 70px;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    padding: 0.3rem 1rem;
    text-align: left;
    z-index: 999;
    height: auto; /* now only wraps the links */
    border-bottom-left-radius: 10px;
    border-bottom-right-radius: 10px;
  }

.nav-menu.active {
  display: flex;
  height: auto; /* ‚úÖ remove full screen effect */
}



  nav ul li {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
  }

  nav ul li a {
    display: block;
    color: #fff;
    font-size: 0.85rem;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    text-decoration: none;
    padding: 0.15rem 0;
    line-height: 1.1;
    letter-spacing: 1px;
    transition: color 0.25s ease;
  }

  nav ul li a:hover {
    color: #10b981; /* green hover accent */
  }

  .menu-btn {
    display: block;
    font-size: 1.7rem;
    color: #fff;
  }
  .nav-menu {
  display: none;
  flex-direction: column;
  background-color: black;
  position: absolute;
  top: 60px;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  text-align: left;
  padding: 15px 0;
  z-index: 1000;
  height: auto; /* ‚úÖ only cover menu area */
}

}

  </style>
</head>
<body>
  <!-- Navigation -->
  <nav class="nav">
    <div class="menu-btn">&#9776;</div>
    <div class="nav-logo">Teenagers Dept</div>
    <ul class="nav-menu">
      <li><a href="index.html">Home</a></li>
      <li><a href="sermons.html">Sermons</a></li>
      <li><a href="units.html">Units</a></li>
      <li><a href="gallery.html">Gallery</a></li>
      <li><a href="about.html" class="active">About</a></li>
    </ul>
  </nav>

  <!-- Hero -->
  <section class="hero">
    <h1>About Teenagers Department</h1>
  </section>

  <!-- About -->
  <section class="container">

        <div class="leader-card"><img src="https://randomuser.me/api/portraits/women/68.jpg"><h4>Chidera Okafor</h4><p>Outreach Coordinator</p></div>
        <div class="leader-card"><img src="https://randomuser.me/api/portraits/men/28.jpg"><h4>Samuel Eze</h4><p>Technical Director</p></div>

        <div class="leader-card"><img src="https://randomuser.me/api/portraits/men/11.jpg"><h4>Emeka Nwosu</h4><p>Media Lead</p></div>

  <!-- Our Moments -->
  <section class="container">
    <h2>Our Moments</h2>
    <div class="gallery">
      <img src="https://th.bing.com/th/id/OIP.eCd_WbTCBKjkYoJ9sJVdrgHaE7?w=271&h=180&c=7&r=0&o=7&dpr=1.1&pid=1.7&rm=3" alt="">
      <img src="https://th.bing.com/th/id/OIP.eCd_WbTCBKjkYoJ9sJVdrgHaE7?w=271&h=180&c=7&r=0&o=7&dpr=1.1&pid=1.7&rm=3" alt="">
      <img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," alt="">
      <img src="https://www.bing.com/th/id/OIP.T6nRjFZ6jFoFmXqXc2hTYQHaFj?w=236&h=211&c=8&rs=1&qlt=90&o=6&dpr=1.1&pid=3.1&rm=2" alt="">
      <img src="https://www.bing.com/th/id/OIP.L9wfPquXqHd_5bovjwEt0QHaE8?w=278&h=211&c=8&rs=1&qlt=90&o=6&dpr=1.1&pid=3.1&rm=2" alt="">
      <img src="https://th.bing.com/th/id/OIP.JWD00pb-d3h2XY_B_I_mMAHaE6?w=288&h=190&c=7&r=0&o=5&pid=1.7" alt="">

  <!-- Call to Action -->
  <section class="container cta">
    <h2>Be Part of Us</h2>
    <p>Join the Teenagers Department today and grow with us in Christ.</p>
    <button class="btn-green">Get Involved</button>
  </section>

  <!-- Footer -->
  <footer>
    <p>&copy; 2025 Teenagers Department. All Rights Reserved.</p>
  </footer>

  <!-- Carousel JS -->
  <script>
    const track = document.getElementById('track');
    const prev = document.querySelector('.prev');
    const next = document.querySelector('.next');
    let index = 0;

    function updateCarousel() {
      const cardWidth = track.children[0].offsetWidth + 32; // width + margin
      track.style.transform = `translateX(${-index * cardWidth}px)`;
    }

    next.addEventListener('click', () => {
      if(index < track.children.length - 1) index++;
      updateCarousel();
    });

    prev.addEventListener('click', () => {
      if(index > 0) index--;
      updateCarousel();
    });

    window.addEventListener('resize', updateCarousel);
 
  let lastScrollTop = 0;
  const navbar = document.querySelector("nav"); 

  window.addEventListener("scroll", function() {
    let currentScroll = window.pageYOffset || document.documentElement.scrollTop;

    if (currentScroll > lastScrollTop) {
      // scrolling down ‚Üí hide navbar
      navbar.style.top = "-80px"; 
    } else {
      // scrolling up ‚Üí show navbar
      navbar.style.top = "0";
    }
    lastScrollTop = currentScroll <= 0 ? 0 : currentScroll; // avoid negative values
  });


  const menuBtn = document.querySelector('.menu-btn');
  const navMenu = document.querySelector('.nav-menu');
  menuBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
    navMenu.classList.toggle('active');
  });
  const menuToggle = document.getElementById('menu-toggle');
  const navMenu = document.getElementById('nav-menu');

  menuToggle.addEventListener('click', () => {
    navMenu.classList.toggle('active');
  });


  </script>
</body>
</html>
